meanings.definition: The act of moving back and forth or side to side.
meanings.sent1: The librations of the swing made me feel dizzy.
meanings.sent2: I observed the librations of the boat as it rocked gently on the water.
meanings.sent3: The librations of the dancing puppet entertained the children.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were in a state of librations, uncertain and shifting.
meanings.sent5: The librations of the pendulum were mesmerizing to watch.
